thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: After Tariff Threat, Apprehension and Shock Among Detroit’s Businesses

author: John D. Stoll
title: After Tariff Threat, Apprehension and Shock Among Detroit’s Businesses
text:
AUBURN HILLS, Mich.—In this northern Detroit suburb, tariffs broached by the Trump administration could tilt the equation for local businesses.
India’s Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd., a leading tractor seller that has manufacturing operations here, on Friday started selling its Roxor off-roader to the public, and online orders were coming in by the minute.
At... RELATED VIDEO President Trump signed an executive order on Tuesday that imposed tariffs on washing machines and solar panels. WSJ's Gerald F. Seib examined whether these moves could ignite a trade war with South Korea and China. Photo: AP (Originally Published January 24, 2018) To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
